summary: This bill, the Assault Weapons Ban of 2025, aims to regulate assault weapons and large capacity ammunition feeding devices. It defines these terms, specifies restrictions on their import, sale, manufacture, transfer, and possession. It includes exemptions for certain entities and firearms. The bill mandates background checks for transfers of grandfathered semiautomatic assault weapons and requires identification markings on newly manufactured weapons and devices. It also amends existing laws regarding seizure and forfeiture of prohibited items and allows the use of Byrne grants for buy-back programs.
